string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: 65% Layout, PBT Keycaps, 3-Mode Connection, Battery 4600mAh, XINMENG V2 Satellite Stabilizer, Gasket Mounting, RGB Backlight, Hotswappable Universal 5 pin, Poron Plate Foam, IXPE Switch Pad, Poron Case Foam, Polycarbonate Plate, Alumunium CNC Case Material, Jade White Linear Switch
75% Layout, Gasket Mounting, Alumunium Material Case, RGB Backlight, South-facing LED, NKRO in All Keys, USB Type-C Wired, Cherry Profile, Ashwood V3 Linear Switch, Hotswappable Universal 5 pin
80 keys Alice layout + rotary knob, Polycarbonate housing, Hot swappable, South Facing RGB, PC Plate, USB Type-C Wired, dye sub PBT keycaps, Marble White Switch
75 % Layout, PC Cherry Profile, Battery 4000mAh, 3-mode Connection, RGB Backlight, Tuned Stabilizer, Hotswappable Universal 5 pin
98 % Layout, PBT Cherry Profile Keycaps, Battery 3750 mAh, 3-mode Connection, Full 16.8 Million color RGB Backlight, Tuned RK Stabilizer, Hotswappable Universal 5 pin, Top Mounting, RK Cloud Switch

99 % Layout, Gasket Mounted Structure Design, Battery 8000 mAh, 3-mode Connection, Dual-Tone PBT Material Keycaps, Finely-Tuned Stabilizers, Factory-Lubed Mechanical Switches, Dual-Stage Adjustable Feet, Ultra-Low Latency Performance With Stable Connection

Expanded 75% - 81 keys layout, Full CNC aluminium body, Media knob, 3-mode Connection, PBT Doubleshot Cherry Profile Keycaps, Quark Matte Linear Switch, Customizable keymap and Lighting with VIA, Universal hotswappable 3/5 pin PCB, South-Facing, Poron Gasket Mount, Flex Cut Polycarbonate Plate, Screw-in stabilizer, Pre-installed plate + case foam + anti-static foam Pre-installed switch pads

Body Material Full CNC machined aluminum, Plate Aluminum, Keycaps Double-shot ABS keycaps (not shine-through), Switches Gateron G Phantom, Backlight South-facing RGB LED, Hotswappable Universal 5 pin, Stabs Gateron screw-in PCB stabs, Connectivity Type-C cable, Cable Premium coiled aviator Type-C cable + Type-A to Type-C adapter

OmniPoint 2.0 Adjustable HyperMagnetic Switches (Analog Hall Effect Magnetic Sensor), Guaranteed 100 Million Presses, 5 Custom Profiles On-Board Memory, 32 bit ARM Processor, Adjustable Actuation Points (0.1 mm - 4.0 mm), 3-mode Connection, 0.7ms Response Time, Battery Life ( 37.5 hours - Wireless / 45 hours - Bluetooth with default lighting)

Barebone Only, Win/MacOS Compatible, LED display (customizable), 3-mode Connection, Gasket mounting, Case aluminium CNC, PCBA screw-in stabilizers, Plate polycarbonate flex-cut, PORON Foam + IXPE Switch pads, 3000mAh Battery, Iclude Type-C Braided Cable, Compatible with VIA
